revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''CheckIfSeen'''()
== Usage == Checks if the Actor is visible to any players or cameras a player is looking through.
=== Return value === Returns false if a player can see the Actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
